content: hey @Matt Berg and @Peter Lubell-Doughtie getting this stream setup. adding in @Luke Duncan as well.
cool, thanks Carl adding @Francis Otieno and @Ronald Kudoyi
yep and this is relevant fhir project from opensrp, https://github.com/opensrp/fhircore/
This is well received and will make a followup

@Peter Lubell-Doughtie , @Francis Otieno , @Matt Berg etc...

took me a bit longer to pull together the updates for the point of care system submitting a vaccination event, but a __rough__ draft is here:
https://who-int.github.io/svc/refs/heads/rc2-umbrella/transactions.html

What you want to look at is the Submit Health Event transaction which is the submitting a bundle of QuestionnaireResponses containing the content to sign and QR-encode. (Annoyed that there are now two uses of QR.....). There is also the Retrieve Health Certificate transaction for a second visit (say with a different provider)
i'll be working actively on the IG today (still some sushi errors), but please flag anything that is wonky via the feedback form.
